components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services
components.description: Sites and services that Cloudflare customers use to interact with the Cloudflare Network and its provided services

components.name: Abuse Reports
components.description: Details of how to report abuse to Cloudflare can be found here: https://www.cloudflare.com/en-gb/trust-hub/reporting-abuse/

components.name: Access
components.description: Cloudflare Access determines who can reach your application by applying the Access policies you configure

components.name: AI Gateway
components.description: Cloudflare’s AI Gateway allows you to gain visibility and control over your AI apps.

components.name: Always Online
components.description: Crawling and caching service

components.name: Analytics
components.description: Customer analytics aggregation service

components.name: API
components.description: Application programming interface (API) for customers to read and write their configurations at https://api.cloudflare.com

components.name: API Shield
components.description: A range of products to help identify and address API vulnerabilities.

components.name: Area 1 - API
components.description: Cloudflare Area 1 is an email security platform that protects your organization’s inbox from phishing, spam, and other malicious messages. This particular component relates to the Area 1 API.

components.name: Area 1 - Dash
components.description: Cloudflare Area 1 is an email security platform that protects your organization’s inbox from phishing, spam, and other malicious messages. This particular component relates to the Dashboard.

components.name: Authoritative DNS
components.description: Cloudflare DNS is an enterprise-grade authoritative DNS service that offers the fastest response time, unparalleled redundancy, and advanced security with built-in DDoS mitigation and DNSSEC

components.name: Billing
components.description: Billing and payment service

components.name: Bring Your Own IP (BYOIP)
components.description: Allows Cloudflare customers to advertise their own IPs for use with Magic Transit, Spectrum, or CDN services

components.name: Bot Management
components.description: Bot Management provides sophisticated bot protection for your domain. Customers can identify automated traffic, take appropriate action, and view detailed analytics within the dashboard. Bot Management also supports custom solutions via Workers and Logs.

components.name: Cache Reserve
components.description: Cache Reserve is a large, persistent data store implemented on top of R2. By pushing a single button in the dashboard, your website’s cacheable content will be written to Cache Reserve.

components.name: Calls
components.description: Cloudflare Calls is a distributed real-time data plane. It allows you to build real-time apps without worrying about scaling or regions. It can act as WebRTC selective forwarding unit (SFU), as a fanout delivery system for broadcasting media or anything in between.

components.name: CDN Cache Purge
components.description: CDN single file cache purging service

components.name: Challenge Platform
components.description: When a website is protected by Cloudflare, there are several occasions when it will challenge visitor traffic. If the visitor passes the challenge, their request is allowed. If they fail, the request will be blocked.

components.name: Cloud Connector
components.description: Cloud Connector allows you to route matching incoming traffic from your website to a public cloud provider that you define such as AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure.

components.name: Email Security (Area1)
components.description: Customers with Area1 only product.

components.name: Cloudforce One Reports
components.description: Details of Cloudflare One can be found in this blogpost: https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-cloudforce-one-threat-operations-and-threat-research

components.name: Community Site
components.description: Community forums where customers can interact, ask questions and get help at https://community.cloudflare.com

components.name: Custom Pages
components.description: Custom Error and Challenge Pages

components.name: Data Localization Suite
components.description: The Data Localization Suite (DLS) is a collection of tools that enable customers to choose the location where Cloudflare inspects and stores data, while maintaining the security and performance benefits of our global network.

components.name: Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
components.description: Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention (DLP)

components.name: Dashboard
components.description: Dashboard where customers can view and make changes to their configurations at https://dash.cloudflare.com

components.name: Developer's Site
components.description: Public-facing developer documentation website at https://developers.cloudflare.com

components.name: Digital Experience Monitoring (DEX)
components.description: Digital Experience Monitoring (DEX) enables Zero Trust administrators to pinpoint and resolve issues impacting end-user connectivity and performance.

components.name: Distributed Web Gateway
components.description: Cloudflare’s Web3 gateways provide HTTP-accessible interfaces to Web3 networks: https://developers.cloudflare.com/distributed-web/

components.name: DNS Firewall
components.description: DNS Firewall proxies all DNS queries to your nameservers through Cloudflare’s global network.

components.name: Salt Lake City, UT, United States - (SLC)
DNS Updates
components.description: DNS update service pushing customer DNS changes out to all data centers

Durable Objects
components.description: Durable Objects provide low-latency coordination and consistent permanent storage for the Workers platform.

components.name: Email Routing
components.description: Email Routing service allowing for forwarding of email traffic

components.name: Ethereum Gateway
components.description: https://developers.cloudflare.com/web3/ethereum-gateway/

components.name: Gateway
components.description: Cloudflare’s secure web gateway keeps your data safe from malware, ransomware, phishing, command & control, Shadow IT, and other Internet risks over all ports and protocols. Log every user interaction with rich details.

components.name: Geo-Key Manager
components.description: Keyless SSL management service

components.name: Health Checks
components.description: A Health Check is a service that runs on Cloudflare’s edge network to monitor whether an origin server is online.

components.name: Hyperdrive
components.description: Hyperdrive is a service that accelerates queries you make to existing databases, making it faster to access your data from across the globe, irrespective of your users’ location.

components.name: Images
components.description: Cloudflare service to build a scalable image pipeline to store, resize, optimize and deliver images in a fast and secure manner.

components.name: Load Balancing and Monitoring
components.description: Load balancing and failover service, including origin server monitoring

components.name: Lists
components.description: Lists of IP addresses, hostnames and ASNs

components.name: Logs
components.description: Enterprise Logpull and Logpush services

components.name: Santiago de los Caballeros, Dominican Republic - (STI)
Magic WAN
components.description: Magic WAN replaces legacy WAN architectures with Cloudflare’s network, providing global connectivity, cloud-based security, performance, and control through one simple user interface.

components.name: Marketing Site
components.description: Public-facing marketing website at https://www.cloudflare.com

components.name: Mirage
components.description: Automatic Responsive Web Design via Intelligent Image Loading

components.name: Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago - (POS)
Observatory
components.description: Observatory uses synthetic tests and real user data from browsers to assess the performance of your website. These data sources produce metrics that provide different types of insights into your website’s performance.

components.name: Page Shield
components.description: Page Shield simplifies external script management by tracking loaded resources like scripts and providing alerts when it detects new resources or malicious scripts. Page Shield also tracks the connections made by scripts on your domain’s pages and checks if they are malicious based on their destination.

components.name: R2
components.description: High-performance storage for files and objects with zero egress charges

components.name: Randomness Beacon
components.description: Distributed service for randomness - https://developers.cloudflare.com/randomness-beacon/

components.name: Recursive DNS
components.description: Free recursive DNS service at 1.1.1.1 and 1.0.0.1

components.name: Registrar
components.description: Cloudflare Registrar securely registers and manages customer domain names

components.name: Rules
components.description: This component includes WAF Rules, Transform Rules, Configuration Rules, Origin Rules, Compression Rules, Redirect Rules, Cache Rules, Waiting Room Bypass Rules, URL Normalization, DDoS L4/L7 Rules, Super Bot Fight Mode Rules, Rate Limiting Rules and others

components.name: Secondary DNS
components.description: Secondary DNS capabilities allow for incoming as well as outgoing zone transfers between Cloudflare and other DNS providers.

components.name: Security Center
components.description: Cloudflare Security Center brings together our suite of security products, our security expertise, and unique Internet intelligence as a unified security intelligence solution to strengthen your security posture.

components.name: Snippets
components.description: Cloudflare Snippets provide a flexible way to customize the behavior of your website or application using short pieces of JavaScript code. Use snippets to customize HTTP response headers, implement JWT validation, define complex redirect functionality, and more.

components.name: Spectrum
components.description: Spectrum allows you to route MQTT, email, file transfer, version control, games, and more over TCP or UDP through Cloudflare to mask the origin and protect it from DDoS attacks

components.name: Speed Optimizations
components.description: Cloudflare products that are recommended for enhancing your website’s performance like AMP, APO (Automatic Platform Optimization), Auto Minify, Fonts, Rocket Loader, and SXGs.

components.name: Stream
components.description: Cloudflare Stream lets you or your end users upload, store, encode, and deliver live and on-demand video with one API, without configuring or maintaining infrastructure

components.name: SSL Certificate Provisioning
components.description: Provisioning service for edge certificates like Universal and Advanced SSL

components.name: SSL for SaaS Provisioning
components.description: Certificate provisioning service for custom hostnames on the edge

components.name: Subscriptions
components.description: Changes to subscriptions or placing new orders for service

components.name: Support Site
components.description: Knowledge base and support ticket portal at https://support.cloudflare.com

components.name: Time Services
components.description: Time Services provided in NTP, NTS & Roughtime - https://developers.cloudflare.com/time-services/

components.name: Trace
components.description: Cloudflare Trace follows an HTTP/S request through Cloudflare’s reverse proxy to your origin. Use this tool to understand how different Cloudflare configurations interact with an HTTP/S request for one of your proxied hostnames.

components.name: Tunnel
components.description: Cloudflare Tunnel provides you with a secure way to connect your resources to Cloudflare without a publicly routable IP address

components.name: Turnstile
components.description: Turnstile is a user-friendly, privacy-preserving alternative to CAPTCHA.

components.name: User Profiles
components.description: Changes to the My Profile area of the Cloudflare Dashboard or New Sign Ups

components.name: Waiting Room
components.description: Cloudflare Waiting Room protects websites by queueing site visitors when a website experiences unmanageable surges in legitimate traffic that may otherwise bring an application down.

components.name: Web Analytics
components.description: Cloudflare Web Analytics provides free, privacy-first analytics for your website without changing your DNS or using Cloudflare’s proxy. Cloudflare Web Analytics helps you understand the performance of your web pages as experienced by your site visitors.

components.name: WebSockets
components.description: Cloudflare proxied WebSocket connections.

components.name: Workers
components.description: Cloudflare Workers provides a serverless execution environment that allows you to create new applications or augment existing ones without configuring or maintaining infrastructure

components.name: Workers AI
components.description: Workers AI allows you to run machine learning models, on the Cloudflare network, from your own code – whether that be from Workers, Pages, or anywhere via REST API.

components.name: Workers Preview
components.description: The preview service for Cloudflare Workers, used by Wrangler CLI and dashboard Quick Edit functions.

components.name: Workers KV
components.description: Workers KV is a data storage that allows you to store and retrieve data globally to build dynamic and performant APIs and websites that support high read volumes with low latency

components.name: Workers Observability
components.description: Workers Logs

components.name: Wrangler
components.description: Wrangler is the Cloudflare Developer Platform command-line interface (CLI) that allows you to manage Worker projects.

components.name: Zero Trust Dashboard
components.description: Cloudflare Zero Trust Dashboard where customers can view and make changes to their Cloudflare Gateway configurations at https://dash.teams.cloudflare.com

components.name: Zone Versioning
components.description: Version Management allows you test, deploy, and roll back changes to your zone configuration settings.

incidents.name: Billing Subscription Update and Invoice Issues

incident_updates.body:
We are currently observing and working to resolve the following Billing issues:
 
Failed Plan Modifications:
There are intermittent issues with subscription upgrades, downgrades, and cancellations. This may result in billing charges being applied without the subscription level being updated. In these cases you may contact Cloudflare Support. 

Unpaid Invoices Preventing Plan Modifications:
If you encounter an error message when attempting to modify your plan, the most common cause is an unpaid invoice. In these cases, check if you have an unpaid invoice before contacting Support.

Missing Invoices:
Some unpaid invoices are not visible. These unpaid invoices will still prevent account modifications. In these cases you may contact Cloudflare Support. 

Missing Pay Now Buttons:
For each unpaid invoice there should be a corresponding “Pay Now” button. If that button is not there you can click on the payment link directly within the invoice.

Expired Payment Links:
After 120 days the payment links will expire, so if you have no “Pay Now” button and the link within the invoice is expired, you will need to contact to Support

Duplicate Payments:
You may notice multiple invoices and charges on your bank and PayPal statements that appear to be duplicates. In most cases these are valid, unique charges for previously unpaid months where we were unable to collect your payments. You should not contact support about these cases. 

Due to ongoing billing issues, we are experiencing high demand—please avoid opening duplicate tickets and wait for our response.

components.name: Billing
components.description: Billing and payment service

incidents.name: Support Ticket Migration - Case Access Issues

incident_updates.body: We have identified an issue affecting our Pro and Business customers' ability to access their active cases. Our team is actively working on a fix to resolve this issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, email must be used for case updates.

We will be performing scheduled maintenance in LAX (Los Angeles) datacenter on 2024-12-16 between 17:00 and 21:00 UTC.

Traffic might be re-routed from this location, hence there is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during this maintenance window for end-users in the affected region. For PNI / CNI customers connecting with us in this location, please make sure you are expecting this traffic to fail over elsewhere during this maintenance window as network interfaces in this datacentre may become temporarily unavailable.

You can now subscribe to these notifications via Cloudflare dashboard and receive these updates directly via email, PagerDuty and webhooks (based on your plan): https://developers.cloudflare.com/notifications/notification-available/#cloudflare-status.

affected_components.name: North America - Los Angeles, CA, United States - (LAX)
